descriptions.text: 就读于浙江大学管理学院, 主修专业为信息管理与信息系统。主修课程有
courses: 分布式文件系统及数据库技术
大数据信息系统分析与设计

descriptions.text: Studying at Zhejiang University School of Management, majoring in Information Management and Information Systems.Core courses include
courses: Distributed File Systems and Database Technology
Big Data Information System Analysis and Design
